ERROR.CAPTION: An error occurred

ERROR.ERC_START_CONF_FAILED: There is a problem with the conference server. Please contact your support team.

ERROR.ERC_VIRTUAL_ROOM_NOT_ALLOW_INSTANT_MEETI: Virtual room does not allow instant meetings
ERROR.ERC_AUTH_ACCESS_DENIED: Guest access is not allowed. Please sign in.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Avaya Settings

USER_TAB.DELEGATED_TITLE: Delegates who can schedule meetings into my meeting rooms

ROOM_TAB.MODERATOR_PIN_NOTE: Participants must enter this PIN to use moderator controls.
ROOM_TAB.ENTRY_PIN_NOTE: Participants must enter this PIN to join your meetings.
ROOM_TAB.ALLOW_REQUESTS: Allow requests to join locked meetings
ROOM_TAB.ALWAYS_RECORD_MEETING: Turn on recording automatically at the start of meetings
ROOM_TAB.RECORDING_NOT_SUPPORTED: Recording is not supported for this Virtual Room
ROOM_TAB.WAITING_ROOM: Place participants in a 'waiting room' until the moderator joins
ROOM_TAB.TERMINATE_MEETING: Terminate meeting after the last moderator leaves
ROOM_TAB.ONETIME_PIN: Use one-time PIN for each meeting
ROOM_TAB.AUDIO_PROMPTS_LANGUAGE: Audio Prompt Language for Guest Users:

LOCAL_TAB.ENABLE_SDC: Enable Scopia Desktop Client on this PC

PREFERENCES_TAB.VIDEO_CALLING_EXPLANATION: Disabling ‘Video Calling’ will join a meeting in audio + presentation mode

ERROR.SERVER_NOT_CHANGED: Password has not been changed. Please try again later

ERROR.CANNOT_MACTH_PASSWORD_HISTORY: Exceeded number of previous passwords that cannot be reused
ERROR.MUST_CONTAIN_4_CATEGORIES: Must contain the following 4 categories: Lowercase / Uppercase /Numeric / Non-alphanumeric special characters

DESCRIPTION_LINES.DAILY: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} day(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.DAILY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} day(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.WEEKLY: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} week(s) on {{weeklyDaysString}} effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.WEEKLY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs every {{numberOfRepeats}} week(s) on {{weeklyDaysString}} effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.MONTHLY: Occurs day {{selectedMonthDay}} of every {{numberOfRepeats}} month(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
DESCRIPTION_LINES.MONTHLY_WITH_ENDDATE: Occurs day {{selectedMonthDay}} of every {{numberOfRepeats}} month(s) effective {{meetingDateString}} until {{meetingEndDateString}} from {{meetingTimeString}} to {{meetingEndTimeString}}.
